price: 48. Waxaa magaalada ku sugnaana sagaal nin (oo ah wiilashii madaxdoodii)16, ku fala fasahaad arlada17, wax halleeya aan wax hagaajin.
arabic: وَكَانَ فِي ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ تِسۡعَةُ رَهۡطٖ يُفۡسِدُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا يُصۡلِحُونَ
footnotes:
16. Mufasiriinta qaarkood waxay yidhaahdeen waxaa loola jeedaa magaalada halkan magaaladii qolodii Thamuud, waana magaaladii Al-Xijir – dhadhaab. 
17. Oo ahaa madaxdoodii iyo wiilasha ay dhaleen oo diinta colaadinayey.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wakāna fī al-madīnati tis'ʿatu rahṭin yuf'sidūna fī al-arḍi walā yuṣ'liḥūna
